channel.title: Blog on Peter Warnock
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Peter Warnock

item.title: Terminal Upgrades for CLI Development
item.description: Eleanor Berger shares the terminal tools she uses alongside Claude and other CLI agents.

item.title: Phase 1 Complete: Cody-Beads Integration & Strategic Roadmap
item.description: Complete Phase 1 implementation of Cody-Beads integration with 4,200+ lines of documentation, strategic Q4 2025-Q1 2026 roadmap, and team rollout materials ready for deployment.

item.title: Exploring Web Components: Isolation, Embeds, and 3D
item.description: Three Web Component demos exploring Shadow DOM isolation, CSS 3D rendering, and smart iframe management with Playwright testing.

item.title: Major Infrastructure Overhaul: Bun Migration, Path-Based Builds, and Comprehensive Testing
item.description: Infrastructure overhaul with Bun migration, intelligent path-based builds, comprehensive testing, and enhanced deployment workflows.

item.title: Beads: Distributed Task Management for AI Agents
item.description: Beads offers distributed task management for AI agents with dependency-aware DAGs, git-backed persistence, and agent-friendly workflows that integrate seamlessly with development workflows.

item.title: Amp Coding Agent: Features That Make It Stand Out
item.description: Amp coding agent features Handoff for context transitions, message queueing, scoped instructions, and extensible toolboxes for enhanced developer workflow.

item.title: Thoughtworks Technology Radar Volume 33
item.description: Thoughtworks Technology Radar Volume 33 highlights key trends including AI infrastructure orchestration, rise of MCP-powered agents, and evolving AI coding workflows that are reshaping software development practices.

item.title: Inspired by Gemini CLI: My Journey with Astro Starlight
item.description: A journey of discovery sparked by the Gemini CLI website, leading to exploration of Astro Starlight and expanding my web development toolkit.

item.title: Stay Grounded: A Calvin and Hobbes Reflection
item.description: How Calvin and Hobbes teaches us to make things easier without making them emptier, keeping the texture that makes life meaningful.

item.title: Grokipedia 0.1: AI-Powered Knowledge Platform with Real-time Fact Correction
item.description: Grokipedia 0.1 is an AI-powered knowledge platform with real-time fact correction, offering an open alternative to Wikipedia.

item.title: ChatGPT Atlas: AI-Powered Web Browsing Revolution
item.description: ChatGPT Atlas revolutionizes web browsing with AI-powered features including agent mode, browser memories, and personalized assistance integrated directly into the browsing experience.

item.title: Vibe Coding Revolution: Developer vs Product Tools 2025
item.description: Comprehensive analysis of the 2025 vibe coding revolution, comparing developer-centric IDEs against product-focused app builders in the evolving AI coding landscape.

item.title: 65 Days of Seth Godin: Daily Journal Prompts as a Calendar
item.description: Turn Seth Godin wisdom into daily habits with 65 journal prompts delivered via calendar.

item.title: Principles Over Methods
item.description: Why principles matter more than methods in innovation and AI, featuring Harrington Emerson’s wisdom on grasping fundamentals for success.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction to Lorem Ipsum, the standard dummy text used in printing and typesetting since the 1500s, with its fascinating history and modern applications.

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo and Daisy UI
item.description: Learn how to set up a fast static site using Hugo combined with Daisy UI components for modern, responsive design without JavaScript bloat.

item.title: Modern Web Development in 2025
item.description: Exploring the current web development landscape: component architectures, performance optimization, edge computing, and the modern static site stack for optimal user experience.

item.title: Leadership Lessons from 10 Years in Tech
item.description: Key insights from a decade in technology leadership: communication excellence, hiring for potential, creating psychological safety, and balancing short-term wins with long-term vision.
